TEXT.TITLE: ROCHESTER COMMUNITY SAVINGS BANK <RCSB.O> 2ND
TEXT.BODY:
Second quarter ended May 31. Shr 27 cts vs NA Net 3,560 mln vs 2,389,000 Six mths Shr 57 cts vs NA Net 7,881,000 vs 5,415,000 NOTE: Year-ago per shr figures not available as bank converted to stock ownership April 29, 1986.
1987 2nd quarter and six mth net excludes 2,288,000 dlrs or 17 cts a share and 4,648,000 dlrs or 33 cts a share, respectively, for tax carryforwards. 1986 2nd qtr and six mth net excludes 667,000 dlrs and 3,043,000 dlrs, respectively, for tax carryforwards. Reuter
